intro: Desmochaeta micrantha, commonly known as the small-flowered desmochaeta, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, clustered umbels of white or pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and stream banks. Its leaves are pinnately divided, with a delicate, feathery appearance. Desmochaeta micrantha is often found in temperate regions of the Northern Hemisphere.
